name: Rose
careTip: Water roses early in the morning to avoid mildew.

name: Tulip
careTip: Tulips prefer well-drained soil, water them sparingly.

name: Fern
careTip: Ferns need humid conditions, mist regularly.

name: Orchid
careTip: Water orchids once a week, let them dry out between.

name: Cactus
careTip: Cacti require very little water, once every two weeks.

name: Lily
careTip: Lilies prefer slightly moist soil, do not overwater.

name: Basil
careTip: Water basil regularly, but avoid overwatering.

name: Mint
careTip: Mint thrives in moist soil, water regularly.

name: Spider Plant
careTip: Spider plants prefer to dry out between waterings.

name: Snake Plant
careTip: Snake plants need minimal water, let them dry out.

name: Peace Lily
careTip: Keep soil slightly moist, but not soggy.

name: Pothos
careTip: Water when the top inch of soil feels dry.

name: Aloe Vera
careTip: Let the soil dry completely between waterings.

name: Jade Plant
careTip: Water jade plants sparingly, once a week.

name: Lavender
careTip: Lavender prefers dry soil, water sparingly.

name: Chamomile
careTip: Water regularly, but ensure good drainage.

name: Rosemary
careTip: Rosemary likes to dry out between waterings.

name: Sage
careTip: Sage prefers dry conditions, water sparingly.

name: Thyme
careTip: Thyme thrives in dry, well-drained soil.

name: Lemon Balm
careTip: Water frequently, but avoid waterlogged soil.
